## About Me:

I’m a results-oriented data scientist currently pursuing Master’s in Data Science and Analytics at Grand Valley State University. My academic foundation in Actuarial Science from the University of Eldoret, Kenya, provides a strong quantitative base. I’m proficient in Python, R, and SQL, and adept at applying statistical methods to uncover actionable insights.

My career spans banking, insurance, and research, where I’ve successfully transformed data into strategic business advantages. I excel in data analysis, statistical modeling, and problem-solving. My ability to communicate complex findings clearly, coupled with my strong project management skills, has been instrumental in delivering successful projects.
